Quality, affordable health care should be a right for all Americans and not a privilege for the few. It shouldn’t matter how much money you make or where you live. That’s why I support Medicare for All.

Today I voted to pass the #FY19NDAA which includes numerous military necessities, including over $150 million in military construction $$ for TX. I secured over 30 provisions that were adopted, benefitting TX, as well as US national security interests. --> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4013

No one should be invisible, especially in the census. The Census Equality Act would ensure LGBTQ Americans are counted to get appropriate government resources and civil rights protections. 
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1024369353230147585 QT @NPR If the Census Equality Act becomes a law, sexual orientation and gender identity questions would have to be added to forms for the census by 2030. https://www.npr.org/2018/07/31/634243854/senate-bill-to-require-sexual-orientation-gender-identity-data-by-2030-census?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20180731
